public interface UserRepository extends EmployeeRepository<User>

Interface UserRepository

This is a User specific repository. It extends EmployeeRepository

    • getCreatedComplains

      List<Complaint> getCreatedComplains(String email) throws NotFoundException
      Get all created complaints by a user
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user. Throws IllegalArgumentException if the email is null.
      Returns:
      A List of created complains
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the user does not exist
